content.question: ​In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, angle <math alttext="B A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is an angle in standard position with terminal ray <math alttext="A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, which intersects the unit circle at the point with coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses 0.4 comma negative 0.9 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>0.4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>0.9</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following descriptions is correct?

choices.label: ​The tangent of angle <math alttext="B A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 4 over 9"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> , and the slope of ray <math alttext="A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 4 over 9"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The tangent of angle <math alttext="B A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 4 over 9"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the slope of ray <math alttext="A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 9 over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

The tangent of angle <math alttext="B A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 9 over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the slope of ray <math alttext="A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 9 over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

The tangent of angle <math alttext="B A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 9 over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the slope of ray <math alttext="A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="4 over 9"><semantics><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: The tangent of angle <math alttext="B A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 9 over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the slope of ray <math alttext="A C"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 9 over 4"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
